html:
4.4.20  2:20 am   Are you in isolation due to COVID-19 Pandemic 

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.4.20  2:05 am   Did you do a bad thing and regret the thing you did

     that sounds like something i would do

4.4.20  2:01 am   are there secrets on this website??

     the whole website is a secret

4.4.20  1:59 am   if you were a cake what cake would you be

     that is your choice. it was your idea

4.4.20  1:42 am   i'm not satisfied with my recent life choices. 

     this is a perfect opportunity to make much better ones

4.4.20  1:14 am   if you have a worst day does that mean that all days will be statistically more better

     yes

4.4.20  1:06 am   you are!!!!! the best music man!!!!! ever!!!!! i love you!!!!

     holy small town breakfast restaurant, you are very friendly

4.4.20  1:02 am   What's your opinion on trees?

     they are like the godzilla version of plants

4.4.20  12:44 am   Thank you so much for making you music! What inspired you?

     literally everything. still does

4.4.20  12:39 am   Thoughts on soccer?

     hands free. good for multi tasking

4.4.20  12:34 am   I really love your use of tri-tone substitution in your songs (the chord stuffs),

     i am skeptical that you have found anywhere i've used tri-tone substitution in my songs. i may have used it once or twice but probably not very often. i used it much more as a young child than i do now

      who is your leading inspiration for that kind of thing?

     no one

4.4.20  12:16 am   when are you planning to die?

     maybe some other time

4.4.20  12:03 am   What do you think about 420 and 69?

     they are the first numbers taught in school

4.3.20  11:59 pm   What's the most normal/standard question you've ever been asked?

     this one

4.3.20  11:48 pm   I have no hope in humanity.

     hm, well then you are in for a surprise

4.3.20  11:43 pm   are you out somewhere doing poetry

     engineering

4.3.20  11:32 pm   Why you sucks a lot and then left?

     don't worry i didn't leave

     You disgusting flesh bag

     fair enough

4.3.20  11:26 pm   when i get high your songs feel like they last longer; is that part of the songs? or is it part of me?

     you and/or the world in general

     or are those not different?

     i was going to say yes but now that i think about it no

4.3.20  11:25 pm   Hey bill. What's your favorite Italian dish?

     plate

4.3.20  11:18 pm   Is the whole theme of the Monday Videos having no speech?

     yes, and no cameras. this was contrasted by thursday videos from that time, which would allow both. sometimes when there are too many ways to make videos, you need to compartmentalize the strategies, to survive

4.3.20  11:17 pm   what do you think about friends?

     they're pretty good

4.3.20  11:12 pm   What even is your genre of music?

     regular

      It's so good and original 

     that works too i guess

4.3.20  11:02 pm   Opinions on humanity? 

     it's off to a good start

4.3.20  10:54 pm   What time is it 

     Friday, April 3, 2020 11:12:10 PM

4.3.20  10:46 pm   did you learn all those instruments yourself

     which instruments? nevermind, yes

4.3.20  10:41 pm   hey bill! i heard you're learning how to use blender, the animation software, is it true? (sorry if im being all nosy)

     at this point i am less learning how to use it and more telling it how to use me

4.3.20  10:32 pm   Do you like burger? 

     never heard of it

4.3.20  10:17 pm   What's your favourite tool?

     stick

4.3.20  10:08 pm   Can you cure the corona virus ?

     i'll look into it

4.3.20  10:03 pm   When did you have a love for music

     always

     or a love for something else? 

     also always

4.3.20  9:57 pm   communism. what is ur opinion

     "it just works"

4.3.20  9:29 pm   do you use jazz chords to make your songs sound so cool?

     not quite

4.3.20  8:56 pm   are you alive and breahting

     oh that would explain a lot

4.3.20  8:43 pm   Every time I go through an airport, I can't not hear "at the airport terminal" going through my head and I end up a giggly mess and everyone looks at me like I'm crazy. Any advice on how to not seem crazy? Thanks

     you could go to pilot school. they teach you how to not seem crazy

4.3.20  8:11 pm   Do you like flags?

     yes but i wish they'd wave more

4.3.20  8:09 pm   I read somewhere in a book that America has 39 different flavors of ice cream! Is this true? 

     i only know of 2, but you may be right

4.3.20  7:56 pm   What's your favorite music artist?

     you

4.3.20  7:51 pm   you are the big music.

     not yet............

      good job.

4.3.20  7:48 pm   can you teach me how to life?

     i'll try

4.3.20  7:36 pm   do you like to dance in your videos

     i never thought of it that way

4.3.20  7:09 pm   are you a person?

     oh that would explain a lot

4.3.20  6:48 pm   when is your next song?

     right away

4.3.20  6:46 pm   are you cool enough?

     no

4.3.20  6:32 pm   at what point do you not become you if your cells are constantly regenerating?

     never. you are always becoming you, constantly

4.3.20  6:29 pm   Do you have other hobbies besides music and history 

     fiction, fact, etc

4.3.20  6:25 pm   Should I let my doubts stop me?

     i'm not sure

4.3.20  6:24 pm   How might one have a discussion with someone who has an entirely different view of the world and can't go beyond their own presuppositions?  

     hm, you could try going beyond some of yours

     Is it possible to arrive at an agreement with such a person?

     yes

4.3.20  6:23 pm   Hello!
I was wondering how you come up with song ideas, do you do something you like or what sounds nice?

     exactly

     And what's your favorite movie?

     it's my job to make the movies

4.3.20  6:13 pm   what flavour is your music

     original flavour

4.3.20  6:12 pm   Have you heard of water.

     yes

     Me neither.
